author: jgm
content:
Quick data dump for sync committees and devnet 2.  I took 1,024 slots (which involved 1,011 blocks) from the start of the latest sync committee (slot 32,768) as my data slice.  Comments:

  - there are a number of occasions where all 512 votes were present in the block (yay)
    - including the first slot of the period (double yay)
  - some clients seem to have a much lower inclusion rate than others (surmising through the chunking of vote frequency)
  - there is no obvious "beginning of epoch" problem with a reduction in votes for lower slot-in-epoch blocks

Raw data and graphs are at https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1xatADifGpQnrgDP81uVjvmpklzLzpG4N_5ay4KGirFI/edit?usp=sharing

author: ralexstokes
content: that's all super exciting to hear! looking forward to watching how pyrmont shapes up
